org.apache.flink.runtime.checkpoint.stats

接口 CheckpointStatsTracker

  • 所有已知实现类:
    DisabledCheckpointStatsTracker, SimpleCheckpointStatsTracker

    public interface CheckpointStatsTracker
    A tracker for checkpoint statistics.

    You can disable statistics by setting ConfigConstants.JOB_MANAGER_WEB_CHECKPOINTS_DISABLE.

    • 方法概要

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      scala.Option<JobCheckpointStats> getJobStats()
      Returns a snapshot of the checkpoint statistics for a job.
      scala.Option<OperatorCheckpointStats> getOperatorStats(JobVertexID operatorId)
      Returns a snapshot of the checkpoint statistics for an operator.
      void onCompletedCheckpoint(CompletedCheckpoint checkpoint)
      Callback on a completed checkpoint.

    • 方法详细资料

      • onCompletedCheckpoint

        void onCompletedCheckpoint(CompletedCheckpoint checkpoint)
        Callback on a completed checkpoint.
        参数:
        checkpoint - The completed checkpoint.

      • getJobStats

        scala.Option<JobCheckpointStats> getJobStats()
        Returns a snapshot of the checkpoint statistics for a job.
        返回:
        Checkpoints stats for the job.

      • getOperatorStats

        scala.Option<OperatorCheckpointStats> getOperatorStats(JobVertexID operatorId)
        Returns a snapshot of the checkpoint statistics for an operator.
        参数:
        operatorId - The operator ID to gather the stats for.
        返回:
        Checkpoint stats for the operator.
        抛出:
        IllegalArgumentException - If unknown operator ID.
